alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued May 27 at 8:00AM MDT until May 31 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow possible. Total snow accumulations up to 2 to 3 feet above 8000 foot elevations. Winds could gust as high as 30 mph. Beartooth Highway will experience winter weather conditions. * WHERE...Absaroka/Beartooth Mountains. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Recreation and travel in the high country could be impacted by heavy accumulating snow. This will impact the Beartooth Highway.
info.instruction: Consider taking a winter storm kit along with you, including such items as tire chains, booster cables, flashlight, shovel, blankets and extra clothing. Also take water, a first aid kit, and anything else that would help you survive in case you become stranded.
